text: Felix Timmermans (5 July 1886 â€“ 24 January 1947) was a writer, poet, and drawer from Belgium. Timmermans was born in Lier, a Belgian city, near Antwerp. == Bibliography (selection) == * Pallieter (1916) * Het kindeke Jezus in Vlaanderen (1919) * De pastoor uit den bloeyenden wijngaerdt (1924) * Pieter Bruegel, zoo heb ik uit uwe werken geroken (1928) * De harp van Sint- Franciscus (1932) * Boerenpsalm (1935) * De familie Hernat (1941) * Een lepel herinneringen (1943) * Adriaan Brouwer (1948) == Translations == Some of his books were translated and published in English, French, German, Lithuanian, and Italian. == Filmography == * Boerenpsalm (1989) * Pallieter (1975) * Little Baby Jesus of Flandr (2010) Category:1886 births Category:1947 deaths Category:Belgian artists Category:Belgian novelists Category:Belgian playwrights Category:Belgian poets
title: Felix Timmermans
